name: Divinity: Original Sin - Collector's Edition
summary:
This collector's edition includes: 
 
- Divinity: Original Sin (DVD + 2 Steam keys) 
- Beyond Divinity (Steam key) 
- Divine Divinity (Steam key) 
- Cloth map of Rivellon 
- Deck of 30 crafting recipe cards 
- Deck of 54 playing cards with a Divinity theme 
- Manual 
- Set of stickers 
- Soundtrack disc 
- Two-sided A2 poster 
- Two DLC items: Zingalore's Trunks of Intelligence and The Golden Grail
